data.comment: The big names in today's match at Liberty Stadium have now been confirmed.
Swansea kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 45, Ryan Bennett is booked for the home team.
The second-half is underway. Reading with the kick-off.
In the minute 53, Ryan Bennett (Swansea) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Joel Latibeaudiere.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a first substitution, with Sone Aluko replacing Alfa Semedo.
The away team replace Sam Baldock with John Swift.
In the minute 73, Omar Richards is replacing Ovie Ejaria for Reading at Liberty Stadium.
The home team have replaced Korey Smith with Kasey Palmer. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
Swansea make their third substitution with Viktor Gyokeres replacing Jamal Lowe.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
